first_translate: what brings you here, lord arendt?!

hangle: 귀족이 아닌 아가씨가 마리안 의상실을 이용하신다고요?
first_translate: an ordinary young woman like you is visiting marian's dressmaking shop?

hangle: 제가 마리안 의상실에 다녀온 걸 어떻게 아셨죠?
first_translate: how did you know I was there just now?
because I saw you come out.
my apologies for intruding on your privacy.

hangle: …그리고 의상실은 아는 사람 때문에 들어간 것뿐이에요.
first_translate: and I only went into that place because someone invited me.
then may I call you miss celine instead?

hangle: 가라고 하고 싶은데, 귀족이 아니라고 한 주제에
first_translate: I want to tell him to go away, but he’s still a marquess even though I'm no longer a noblewoman myself!
I can’t possibly chase him away!
do you have any business with me, my lord?
if you don’t plan on working officially as a magician in the capital,

hangle: 혹시 수도에서 정식 마법사로 활동하는 게 아니라면…
first_translate: I’d like to make you a proposal.
I'd like to make you a proposal.

hangle: 아렌트는 내 마법적인 재능에 관심을 가진 게 틀림없다.
first_translate: arendt must definitely be interested in my magical abilities.
this is exactly how things played out in the original story.

hangle: 말씀은 감사하지만 전 마법사로 활동할 생각이 없어서요.
first_translate: I appreciate your offer, but I do not wish to work as a magician.

hangle: 혹시 따로 원하는 조건이 있다면 들어드리죠.
first_translate: is there anything else you would like from me?
go ahead and say what’s on your mind.
how much money will it take?
no, I don’t need any money.

hangle: 저에게 오시면 마르지 않는 명예를 약속드릴 수…
first_translate: come under my wing, and I promise you’ll receive eternal glory--
doesn’t look like she knows who this guy is yet.
I didn’t realize you were back in the capital already.
so you’re marquess arendt clovis, right?
wait! why all of a sudden?!
to show her the dragon we caught.
she hasn’t seen one before, has she?

hangle: 무슨, 치킨 사 왔다는 투로 저런 말을 하네-!!
first_translate: look at them talk about dragons like they’re ordering fried chicken or something!

hangle: 그놈이 어찌나 서두르는지, 죽는 줄 알았다.
first_translate: the way he rushed after it made me think he might die trying.

hangle: 클로비스 후작은 얘한테 무슨 볼일인지 모르겠군.
first_translate: I wonder what his highness wants with you.

hangle: 셀린 양과는 아주 중요한 이야기를 하는 중이었습니다.
first_translate: miss celine and I were having a very important conversation.
give me some time alone with her.
give me some time alone with her.

hangle: 그런가… 하지만 그 이야기는 나중으로 미뤄야겠군.
first_translate: alright... but our discussion will have to wait until later.
unfortunately, I doubt that'll be possible.

hangle: 전 아직 셀린 양에게 마저 할 말이 남아 있거든요.
first_translate: I haven’t finished speaking with miss celine yet.
who does she think she is, telling abel to scram?!

hangle: 실례지만 셀린 양과 공작님이 무슨 사이인지 물어도 괜찮을까요.
first_translate: pardon me, but am I allowed to ask what kind of relationship you two share?
that means “if it doesn’t concern you, leave”!
what are you going to do, your grace?!

hangle: 전 상사와 부하라고 하면 공작님이 밀린다고요!
first_translate: telling people that we used to be boss and subordinate isn’t gonna cut it this time!
I wasn’t aware that you had a daughter, your grace.

hangle: 셀린 양은 처음 듣는 이야기란 표정인데요.
first_translate: judging by her expression, it seems like miss celine heard nothing about this beforehand either.
of course not. she found out just now too.

hangle: 그러니 부녀간의 오붓한 시간을 위해 빨리 가주면 좋겠군,
first_translate: now, please excuse us while we spend quality father-daughter time together,
why did you really return to the capital?
I quit being a magician, not took a break.
next time, try ignoring those pesky flies when they bother you.
it could’ve been funnier if siegern was around.
by chance, are you referring to marquess clovis?
what in the world is that?!

hangle: 괜찮아, 네가 생각하는 그런 게 아니니까.
first_translate: it’s alright. it’s not what you think it is.

hangle: 저건 사람들을 괴롭히기 위해 온 마물이 아니라―
first_translate: that creature didn’t come to harm anyone.
